title: Tavern Keeper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Have a celebratory beverage with a player at night, roleblocking them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The following day, the player will have a hangover and be immune to roleblocks the following night.
- If you attempt to roleblock an uncautious Serial Killer, they will attack you.
- You are immune to roleblocks.

desc:
Post 3848
*I can see why it was reflavored... but that doesn't mean I agree with it.*
